title: No train service between Marina Bay and Marina South Pier

title_translations.zh-Hans: 海军部站和海军少校站之间没有火车服务
title_translations.ms: Tiada perkhidmatan kereta api antara Marina Bay dan Marina South Pier
title_translations.ta: மெரினா பே மற்றும் மெரினா சவுத் பியர் இடையே ரயில் சேவை இல்லை

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service between #MarinaBay and #MarinaSouthPier have resumed. Free regular bus service has ceased.
[NSL] CLEARED: Train service between #MarinaBay and #MarinaSouthPier is running normally. Free regular buses are still available.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train service between #MarinaBay and #MarinaSouthPier due to a train fault. Expected resumption time: 8.05am.
[NSL] UPDATE: No train service between #MarinaBay and #MarinaSouthPier due to a train fault. Free regular buses are available.
